source:
BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/web-order/stage/delta-lake/order-header/"
TARGET_ORDER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/web-order/master/delta-lake/order/"
TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/web-order/master/delta-lake/order-header/"
TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_COLS = ["orderId", "originalOrderId", "cncOrderId", "userId", "orderDate", "prZoneCd", "orderStatus", "pickupStatus", "orderDescription",
                            "orderTypeCd" , "orderTime", "requestDate", "requestTime", "deliveryDate", "deliverySlotStart", "deliverySlotEnd",
                            "deliveryMethod", "fulfillmentMethod", "liquorCd", "drugCd", "tobaccoCd", "outOfStockFl",
                            "groceryTotalQy", "taxQy", "bottleDepositQy", "couponsDiscountsTotal", "orderTotal", "totalItemCount", "year", "month", "day"]
KEY_COLS = ["userId","orderId"]
PARTITION_COLS = ["year", "month", "day"]

logger.info("********************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - ORDER-HEADER - WEB_ORDER - ORDER_HISTORY - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("********************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_ORDER_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_ORDER_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_COLS : {0}".format(TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_COLS))
logger.info("\t KEY_COLS : {0}".format(KEY_COLS))
logger.info("\t PARTITION_COLS : {0}".format(PARTITION_COLS))
logger.info("*********************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def init():
    df_web_order_header = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_ORDER_PATH) \
        .select(TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_COLS)
    logger.info("init-load: Read orders from order container. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_web_order_header.count(),TARGET_ORDER_PATH))

    df_web_order_header \
        .repartition(5, KEY_COLS) \
        .sort(KEY_COLS) \
        .write \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("mergeSchema", "true") \
        .format("delta") \
        .partitionBy(PARTITION_COLS) \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH)
    logger.info("init-load: Created order-header. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_web_order_header.count(),TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))

##############################
# MAIN STARTS HERE
##############################
if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH) == False):
    init()

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def apply_cdc():
    df_web_order_master = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_ORDER_PATH)

    df_web_order_delta = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH)
    
    logger.info("cdc-load: Read delta orders from stage container. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_web_order_delta.count(),STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))

    df_web_order_delta.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_web_order_delta")
    df_web_order_master.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_web_order_master")

    df_web_order_header_stage = spark \
        .sql(
            """
            SELECT m.orderId
                , m.originalOrderId
                , m.cncOrderId
                , m.userId
                , m.orderDate
                , m.prZoneCd
                , m.orderStatus
                , m.pickupStatus
                , m.orderDescription
                , m.orderTypeCd
                , m.orderTime
                , m.requestDate
                , m.requestTime
                , m.deliveryDate
                , m.deliverySlotStart
                , m.deliverySlotEnd
                , m.deliveryMethod
                , m.fulfillmentMethod
                , m.liquorCd
                , m.drugCd
                , m.tobaccoCd
                , m.outOfStockFl
                , m.groceryTotalQy
                , m.taxQy
                , m.bottleDepositQy
                , m.couponsDiscountsTotal
                , m.orderTotal
                , m.totalItemCount
                , m.year
                , m.month
                , m.day
            FROM tbl_web_order_delta d
            INNER JOIN tbl_web_order_master m
            ON d.year = m.year
            AND d.month = m.month
            AND d.day = m.day
            AND d.orderId = m.orderId
            """) \
        .select(TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_COLS)
        
    df_web_order_header_master = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_ORDER_HEADER_PATH)
    
    logger.info("cdc-load: Built order-hdr-stg & order-hdr-mstr datasets. Stage={0}, Master={1}".format(df_web_order_header_stage.count(),df_web_order_header_master.count()))

    df_web_order_header_stage.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_web_order_header_stage")
    df_web_order_header_master.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_web_order_header_master")

    spark.sql(
        """
        MERGE INTO tbl_web_order_header_master
        USING tbl_web_order_header_stage
        ON tbl_web_order_header_master.year = tbl_web_order_header_stage.year
        AND tbl_web_order_header_master.month = tbl_web_order_header_stage.month
        AND tbl_web_order_header_master.day = tbl_web_order_header_stage.day
        AND tbl_web_order_header_master.orderId = tbl_web_order_header_stage.orderId
        WHEN MATCHED THEN 
            UPDATE SET *
        WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
            INSERT *
        """
    )

    logger.info("cdc-load: Merged order-hdr-stg -> order-hdr-mstr. Stage={0}, Master={1}".format(df_web_order_header_stage.count(),df_web_order_header_master.count()))


if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH)):
    apply_cdc()
else:
    logger.info("cdc-load: No delta orders found at path = {0}".format(STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("cdc-load: Cleaned up delta data container = {0}".format(STAGE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))
